title: Change internal energy of gas while energy added

content.description: A sample of an ideal gas is taken through the cycle abca, as shown in the PV diagram above.
content.question: If 1000 J of heat is added to the gas during process ab, what is the change in internal energy of the gas for process ab ?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
